Name: Tile fragment
Description: Curved fragment of a glazed tile, in shades of <!-->turquoise blue and lapis blue, from el-`Amarna, the city founded in Middle Egypt as Residence and centre of the sun-cult under Akhenaten. The polychrome glaze is typical of the luxurious products of the city, constructed at a time of increased trade between Egypt and the technologically more advanced centres in Western Asia.
